original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Sahara Safari
overview: The Libyan area of the Sahara fascinates with its varied landscapes of lakes set amid desert dunes, ancient towns built of mud, camps with straw-covered circular huts, prehistoric rock paintings and amazing multi-shaped stone formations. The Sahara, although scorching hot and untamed by Man, has shared with us its remarkable and memorable natural wonders!
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Sahara Safari
